-c|--context: --- Name of the context to use to connect to the daemon
--tlscacert: --- Trust certs signed only by this CA
--tlsverify: --- Use TLS and verify the remote

manifest.#desc: Manage Docker image manifests and manifest lists

scan.--accept-license: --- Accept using a third party scanning provider
scan.--dependency-tree: --- Show dependency tree with scan results
scan.--exclude-base: --- Exclude base image from vulnerability scanning
scan.-f|--file: --- Dockerfile associated with image, provides more detailed results
scan.--group-issues: --- Aggregate duplicated vulnerabilities and group them to a single one
scan.--login: --- Authenticate to the scan provider using an optional token , or web base token if empty
scan.--reject-license: --- Reject using a third party scanning provider
scan.--severity: --- Only report vulnerabilities of provided level or higher
scan.--token: --- Authentication token to login to the third party scanning provider
scan.--version: --- Display version of the scan plugin

build.--cache-from: --- Images to consider as cache sources
build.--iidfile: --- Write the image ID to the file
build.--network: --- Set the networking mode for the RUN instructions during build
build.--no-cache: --- Do not use cache when building the image
build.--platform: --- Set platform if server is multi-platform capable
build.--pull: --- Always attempt to pull a newer version of the image
build.-q|--quiet: --- Suppress the build output and print image ID on success
build.--secret: --- Secret file to expose to the build : id=mysecret,src=/local/secret
build.--ssh: --- SSH agent socket or keys to expose to the build  (format: default|
build.-t|--tag: --- Name and optionally a tag in the 'name:tag' format
build.--target: --- Set the target build stage to build.
build.#desc: Build an image from a Dockerfile

commit.-c|--change: --- Apply Dockerfile instruction to the created image
commit.#desc: Create a new image from a container's changes

cp.-L|--follow-link: --- Always follow symbol link in SRC_PATH
cp.#desc: Copy files/folders between a container and the local filesystem

create.-a|--attach: --- Attach to STDIN, STDOUT or STDERR
create.--cgroup-parent: --- Optional parent cgroup for the container
create.--cidfile: --- Write the container ID to the file
create.--cpu-rt-period: --- Limit CPU real-time period in microseconds
create.--cpu-rt-runtime: --- Limit CPU real-time runtime in microseconds
create.--cpuset-cpus: --- CPUs in which to allow execution
create.--cpuset-mems: --- MEMs in which to allow execution
create.--device: --- Add a host device to the container
create.--device-cgroup-rule: --- Add a rule to the cgroup allowed devices list
create.--entrypoint: --- Overwrite the default ENTRYPOINT of the image
create.--env-file: --- Read in a file of environment variables
create.--expose: --- Expose a port or a range of ports
create.--gpus: --- GPU devices to add to the container
create.--health-cmd: --- Command to run to check health
create.--health-retries: --- Consecutive failures needed to report unhealthy
create.--health-start-period: --- Start period for the container to initialize before starting health-retries countdown
create.--health-timeout: --- Maximum time to allow one check to run
create.--init: --- Run an init inside the container that forwards signals and reaps processes
create.-i|--interactive: --- Keep STDIN open even if not attached
create.-l|--label: --- Set meta data on a container
create.--label-file: --- Read in a line delimited file of labels
create.--memory-swap: --- Swap limit equal to memory plus swap: '-1' to enable unlimited swap
create.--mount: --- Attach a filesystem mount to the container
create.--name: --- Assign a name to the container
create.--network: --- Connect a container to a network
create.--network-alias: --- Add network-scoped alias for the container
create.--platform: --- Set platform if server is multi-platform capable
create.--privileged: --- Give extended privileges to this container
create.-p|--publish: --- Publish a container's port to the host
create.-P|--publish-all: --- Publish all exposed ports to random ports
create.--read-only: --- Mount the container's root filesystem as read only
create.--restart: --- Restart policy to apply when a container exits
create.--rm: --- Automatically remove the container when it exits
create.--runtime: --- Runtime to use for this container
create.--storage-opt: --- Storage driver options for the container
create.--volume-driver: --- Optional volume driver for the container
create.--volumes-from: --- Mount volumes from the specified container

diff.#desc: Inspect changes to files or directories on a container's filesystem

events.-f|--filter: --- Filter output based on conditions provided
events.--format: --- Format the output using the given Go template
events.--since: --- Show all events created since timestamp
events.#desc: Get real time events from the server

exec.-d|--detach: --- Detached mode: run command in the background
exec.--detach-keys: --- Override the key sequence for detaching a container
exec.--env-file: --- Read in a file of environment variables
exec.-i|--interactive: --- Keep STDIN open even if not attached
exec.--privileged: --- Give extended privileges to the command
exec.#desc: Run a command in a running container

export.-o|--output: --- Write to a file, instead of STDOUT
export.#desc: Export a container's filesystem as a tar archive

history.--format: --- Pretty-print images using a Go template
history.-H|--human: --- Print sizes and dates in human readable format
history.#desc: Show the history of an image

images.-f|--filter: --- Filter output based on conditions provided
images.--format: --- Pretty-print images using a Go template

import.-c|--change: --- Apply Dockerfile instruction to the created image
import.-m|--message: --- Set commit message for imported image
import.--platform: --- Set platform if server is multi-platform capable
import.#desc: Import the contents from a tarball to create a filesystem image

info.-f|--format: --- Format the output using the given Go template

inspect.-f|--format: --- Format the output using the given Go template
inspect.-s|--size: --- Display total file sizes if the type is container
inspect.#desc: Return low-level information on Docker objects

kill.-s|--signal: --- Signal to send to the container
kill.#desc: Kill one or more running containers

load.-i|--input: --- Read from tar archive file, instead of STDIN
load.#desc: Load an image from a tar archive or STDIN

login.#desc: Log in to a Docker registry

logout.#desc: Log out from a Docker registry

logs.--details: --- Show extra details provided to logs
logs.-n|--tail: --- Number of lines to show from the end of the logs
logs.#desc: Fetch the logs of a container

pause.#desc: Pause all processes within one or more containers

port.#desc: List port mappings or a specific mapping for the container

ps.-f|--filter: --- Filter output based on conditions provided
ps.--format: --- Pretty-print containers using a Go template

pull.-a|--all-tags: --- Download all tagged images in the repository
pull.--platform: --- Set platform if server is multi-platform capable
pull.#desc: Pull an image or a repository from a registry

push.-a|--all-tags: --- Push all tagged images in the repository
push.#desc: Push an image or a repository to a registry

restart.-t|--time: --- Seconds to wait for stop before killing the container

rm.-f|--force: --- Force the removal of a running container
rm.-v|--volumes: --- Remove anonymous volumes associated with the container

run.-a|--attach: --- Attach to STDIN, STDOUT or STDERR
run.--cgroup-parent: --- Optional parent cgroup for the container
run.--cidfile: --- Write the container ID to the file
run.--cpu-rt-period: --- Limit CPU real-time period in microseconds
run.--cpu-rt-runtime: --- Limit CPU real-time runtime in microseconds
run.--cpuset-cpus: --- CPUs in which to allow execution
run.--cpuset-mems: --- MEMs in which to allow execution
run.-d|--detach: --- Run container in background and print container ID
run.--detach-keys: --- Override the key sequence for detaching a container
run.--device: --- Add a host device to the container
run.--device-cgroup-rule: --- Add a rule to the cgroup allowed devices list
run.--entrypoint: --- Overwrite the default ENTRYPOINT of the image
run.--env-file: --- Read in a file of environment variables
run.--expose: --- Expose a port or a range of ports
run.--gpus: --- GPU devices to add to the container
run.--health-cmd: --- Command to run to check health
run.--health-retries: --- Consecutive failures needed to report unhealthy
run.--health-start-period: --- Start period for the container to initialize before starting health-retries countdown
run.--health-timeout: --- Maximum time to allow one check to run
run.--init: --- Run an init inside the container that forwards signals and reaps processes
run.-i|--interactive: --- Keep STDIN open even if not attached
run.-l|--label: --- Set meta data on a container
run.--label-file: --- Read in a line delimited file of labels
run.--memory-swap: --- Swap limit equal to memory plus swap: '-1' to enable unlimited swap
run.--mount: --- Attach a filesystem mount to the container
run.--name: --- Assign a name to the container
run.--network: --- Connect a container to a network
run.--network-alias: --- Add network-scoped alias for the container
run.--platform: --- Set platform if server is multi-platform capable
run.--privileged: --- Give extended privileges to this container
run.-p|--publish: --- Publish a container's port to the host
run.-P|--publish-all: --- Publish all exposed ports to random ports
run.--read-only: --- Mount the container's root filesystem as read only
run.--restart: --- Restart policy to apply when a container exits
run.--rm: --- Automatically remove the container when it exits
run.--runtime: --- Runtime to use for this container
run.--sig-proxy: --- Proxy received signals to the process
run.--storage-opt: --- Storage driver options for the container
run.--volume-driver: --- Optional volume driver for the container
run.--volumes-from: --- Mount volumes from the specified container

save.-o|--output: --- Write to a file, instead of STDOUT
save.#desc: Save one or more images to a tar archive

search.-f|--filter: --- Filter output based on conditions provided
search.--format: --- Pretty-print search using a Go template

start.--detach-keys: --- Override the key sequence for detaching a container
start.#desc: Start one or more stopped containers

stats.--format: --- Pretty-print images using a Go template
stats.--no-stream: --- Disable streaming stats and only pull the first result
stats.#desc: Display a live stream of container resource usage statistics

stop.-t|--time: --- Seconds to wait for stop before killing it
stop.#desc: Stop one or more running containers

tag.#desc: Create a tag TARGET_IMAGE that refers to SOURCE_IMAGE

top.#desc: Display the running processes of a container

unpause.#desc: Unpause all processes within one or more containers

update.--cpu-rt-period: --- Limit the CPU real-time period in microseconds
update.--cpu-rt-runtime: --- Limit the CPU real-time runtime in microseconds
update.--cpuset-cpus: --- CPUs in which to allow execution
update.--cpuset-mems: --- MEMs in which to allow execution
update.--memory-swap: --- Swap limit equal to memory plus swap: '-1' to enable unlimited swap
update.--restart: --- Restart policy to apply when a container exits
